name: Ai Image Alt Text Generator for WP
author: BoomDevs

sections.description: Revolutionize image accessibility and search engine optimization (SEO) on your WordPress website with our innovative AI Image Alt Text Generator. Seamlessly integrated into your platform, this tool employs cutting-edge artificial intelligence algorithms to automatically generate descriptive alt text for all images, enhancing accessibility for visually impaired users and improving your site’s SEO performance. By effortlessly providing accurate and relevant alt text for every image, our solution ensures compliance with accessibility standards while maximizing your content’s visibility and reach. Say goodbye to manual alt text creation and hello to a more efficient and inclusive online presence with our AI Image Alt Text Generator for WordPress.
sections.installation:
There is no prerequisites for installing Ai Image Alt Text Generator for WP. You can follow the steps below to complete the installation.

Automatic Installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New screen from your WordPress website dashboard.
  2. Search for Ai Image Alt Text Generator for WP.
  3. Install and activate the plugin, that’s it!
sections.faq:
Does the plugin come for free?

Yes, it’s completely free.
